level.text: A Demonstration Project recipient shall have the freedom to choose his or her Medicaid providers.
The HIV/AIDS Administration shall provide, as necessary, to all waiver recipients a list of the following at the time of initial enrollment:
List of Ryan White case management providers; or
List of Ryan White HIV-experienced physician and clinic providers and Board-certified infectious disease specialists.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 5605 (May 28, 2004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7435 (July 30, 2004).
